ingredients.heading: Ingredients
ingredients.vegetable: ripe (about 3 lbs), peeled and chopped (yielding about 6 cups)
ingredients.dry: (more may be needed to balance out the acidity of the tomatoes, add to taste)
ingredients.liquid: (or 1 15-ounce can crushed tomatoes if you don't have tomato juice)

directions.heading: Method
directions.step: Place all ingredients in a large bowl. Use an immersion blender or blend in batches, to desired smoothness. We prefer our gazpacho somewhat chunky, so only pulse a few times in the blender.
Place in a non-reactive container (tomatoes are acidic) to store. Chill several hours or overnight to allow the flavors to blend.
